Actions.Name: Add Comment
Actions.Description: Adds a comment to a card or initiative.

Actions.Name: Create Card
Actions.Description: Create a card in a board of your chocie

Actions.Name: Create Subtask
Actions.Description: Creates a new subtask of a card or initiative

Actions.Name: Get Boards
Actions.Description: Get all boards from the account.

Actions.Name: Get Board Columns
Actions.Description: Gets all columns for a specified board.

Actions.Name: Get Lanes
Actions.Description: Gets all lanes for a specified board.

Actions.Name: Get Types
Actions.Description: Gets all types within the account.

Actions.Name: Log Time
Actions.Description: Log time to a card. The time is logged in minutes.

Actions.Name: Move Card
Actions.Description: Move a card (Task or Initiative, if possible) to a column.

Actions.Name: Update Card
Actions.Description: Update the properties of a card (Title, Description, Priority, etc.)
